mapper.select: SELECT MAX(tree_level) FROM ${ tb_name } WHERE tree_level LIKE CONCAT( #{tree_level}, '%' ) AND LENGTH(tree_level) = LENGTH( #{tree_level} ) + 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${ tb_name } ( idx, pidx, tree_level, writer_key, writer, writer_pw, title, content_text, content_html, is_use, is_notice, regdate, reg_ip, views, opt1, opt2, opt3, opt4, opt5, opt6, opt7, opt8, opt9 ) VALUES ( #{ idx }, #{ pidx }, #{ tree_level }, #{ writer_key }, #{ writer }, #{ writer_pw }, #{ title }, #{ content_text }, #{ content_html }, #{ is_use }, #{ is_notice }, #{ regdate }, #{ reg_ip }, #{ views }, #{ opt1 }, #{ opt2 }, #{ opt3 }, #{ opt4 }, #{ opt5 }, #{ opt6 }, #{ opt7 }, #{ opt8 }, #{ opt9 } )
mapper.update: UPDATE ${ tb_name } SET writer_key = #{ writer_key }, writer = #{ writer }, writer_pw = #{ writer_pw }, title = #{ title }, content_text = #{ content_text }, content_html = #{ content_html }, is_use = #{ is_use }, is_notice = #{ is_notice }, reg_ip = #{ reg_ip }, views = #{ views }, opt1 = #{ opt1 }, opt2 = #{ opt2 }, opt3 = #{ opt3 }, opt4 = #{ opt4 }, opt5 = #{ opt5 }, opt6 = #{ opt6 }, opt7 = #{ opt7 }, opt8 = #{ opt8 }, opt9 = #{ opt9 } WHERE idx = #{ idx }
